title: Navigation Menu
description:
Create an accessible navigation menu with links. ## Requirements 1. Use a `
` element with aria-label="Main navigation" 2. Inside nav, create a `
    ` for the menu items 3. Add 5 navigation links as `
  • ` items: - Home (href="/") - About (href="/about") - Services (href="/services") - Blog (href="/blog") - Contact (href="/contact") 4. Mark the current page: - Add class="active" to the Home link - Add aria-current="page" to the Home link 5. Each link should have proper descriptive text ## Expected Structure ```html
    • Home
    • About
      • ...
    ```

testCases.description: Page should have a nav element
Nav should contain a ul element
Each list item should have a link
Home link should have class active

hints: Add aria-label="Main navigation" to the nav element
Add class="active" aria-current="page" to the Home link
Each li should contain exactly one anchor tag
